mapper.select:
select phi.id, phi.code, phi.name, phi.address, phi.business_status, phi.qualification, phi.longitude, phi.latitude, phi.images, phi.business_hours, phi.create_date, phi.legal_person, phi.phone from pharmacy_info phi where 1 = 1
AND phi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pharmacyInfo.code},'%')
AND phi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pharmacyInfo.name},'%')
AND phi.legal_person LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pharmacyInfo.legalPerson},'%')
AND phi.business_status = #{pharmacyInfo.businessStatus}
order by phi.create_date desc
